p: Fiddlesticks' trinket is replaced by scarecrow effigies.
q: Fiddlesticks damaging enemies with spells while unseen or targeting an enemy with Terrify's activation strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
w: Fiddlesticks drains health from nearby enemies, dealing bonus execute damage at the end of the duration.
e: Fiddlesticks slashes an area with its scythe, slowing all enemies hit and silencing enemies hit in the center of the slash.
r: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
